Feature Notes:
Monastic Tradition: 1 selection
Keen Mind: Always knows direction of north and hours until sunrise or sunset/Can recall anything seen or heard during the past month
Ki: May use 20 Ki Points/short rest
Observant: May read lips
Shelter Of The Faithful: May receive aid from temples of NH-Rillifane Rallathil and fellow believers
Timeless Body (Monk): Suffers no debility from aging/Needs no food or water
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon: May communicate in any language
Wholeness Of Body: May regain 60 HP 1/long rest

Combat
Hit Points: 121 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 2
Weapon Proficiency: Shortsword; Simple
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club (+8 1d4+2); Greatclub (+8 1d8+2); Unarmed (+8 1d10+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Martial Arts: When unarmored, gains +2 attack and damage with monk weapons and raises damage die to 1d10
Unarmored Defense (Monk): +2 AC in no armor
Deflect Missiles: May use Reaction to reduce missile damage by 1d10 + 22 HP; reducing to 0 HP allows spending 1 Ki Point for immediate attack
Flurry Of Blows: May spend 1 Ki Point to gain 2 bonus unarmed strikes
Ki-Empowered Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Martial Arts-1: When unarmored, may make a bonus unarmed strike after a monk weapon attack
Mobile: May Dash at full speed in difficult terrain/Suffers no OA from targeted foe
Mounted Combatant: Adv on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount/May redirect attack on mount to self/Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Open Hand Technique: Successful Flurry of Blows attack may inflict choice of knocked prone (DC 16 Dexterity neg), 15' push (DC 16 Strength neg), or denied Reaction for 1 rd
Opportunist: May use Reaction to attack an adjacent foe damaged by an ally
Patient Defense: May spend 1 Ki Point for a bonus Dodge
Perfect Self: Has a minimum of 4 Ki Points available after initiative
Quivering Palm: After a successful unarmed attack, may spend 3 Ki Points to reduce a foe to 0 HP w/in 20 dy (DC 16 Constitution suffer 10d10 HP necrotic)
Step Of The Wind: May spend 1 Ki Point to gain a bonus Disengage or Dash and dbl jump
Stunning Strike: After a successful attack, may spend 1 Ki Point to stun foe (DC 16 Constitution neg) for 1 rd
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Constitution; Dexterity; Intelligence; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 6; Constitution: 8; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: 9; Strength: 6; Wisdom: 8
Save Notes:
Diamond Soul: Proficient on all saves
Resilient: Save Proficiency (Choose 1 from any)
Diamond Soul-1: May spend 1 Ki Point to reroll a save
Evasion: Successful Dexterity save yields no damage instead of half; failure yields half damage
Purity Of Body: Immune to disease and poison
Stillness Of Mind: May end self charm and fright at will
Magic
Spells:
Astral Projection (M9 [Empty Body] Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Burning Hands (M1 [Sweeping Cinder Strike] Evoc): 15' cone inflicts 3d6 HP fire (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Cone Of Cold (M5 [Breath Of Winter] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Darkness (M2 [Shadow Arts] Evoc): R60' Target centers 15' radius lightless area for conc or 10 min
Darkvision (M2 [Shadow Arts] Tran): Touched sees 60' in dark for 8 hr
Fireball (M3 [Flames Of The Phoenix] Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Fly (M3 [Ride The Wind] Tran): Touched gains 60' fly speed for conc or 10 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Gaseous Form (M3 [Mist Stance] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous for conc or 1 hr
Gust Of Wind (M2 [Rush Of The Gale Spirits] Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (Strength neg), inflicts half movement for conc or 1 min
Hold Person (M2 [Clench Of The North Wind] Ench): R60' Immobilizes target (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Minor Illusion (M0 [Shadow Arts] Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Pass Without Trace (M2 [Shadow Arts] Abju): Targets in 30' radius gain +10 Stealth and become untrackable for conc or 1 hr
Sanctuary (M1 [Tranquility] Abju): R30' Foes of target attack another (Wisdom neg) for 1 min
Shatter (M2 [Gong Of The Summit] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Silence (M2 [Shadow Arts] Illu): R120' 20' radius blocks sound for conc or 10 min
Stoneskin (M4 [Eternal Mountain Defense] Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc or 1 hr
Thunderwave (M1 [Fist Of Four Thunders] Evoc): 15' cu inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Constitution half, no push) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Fire (M4 [River Of Hungry Flame] Evoc): R120' 60'x20' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) for conc or 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Stone (M5 [Wave Of Rolling Earth] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' panels for conc or 10 min
Magic Notes:
Disciple Of The Elements: May select 4 elemental disciplines
Breath Of Winter: May spend 6 Ki Points to cast Cone Of Cold
Clench Of The North Wind: May spend 3 Ki Points to cast Hold Person
Cloak Of Shadows (Way Of Shadow): May become invisible in dim and dark areas (attacking or casting ends)
Elemental Attunement: May create a harmless instantaneous elemental effect, light or snuff small flame, chill or warm 1 lb object for 1 hr, or shape 1' cu earth, fire, water, or mist for 1 min
Empty Body: May spend 4 Ki Points to gain 1 min invisibility w/resistance to all damage other than force/May spend 8 Ki Points to cast Astral Projection
Eternal Mountain Defense: May spend 5 Ki Points to cast self Stoneskin
Fangs Of The Fire Snake: May spend 1 Ki Point for +10' unarmed attack, inflicting fire damage, and 1 additional Ki Point to inflict +1d10 HP fire
Fist Of Four Thunders: May spend 2 Ki Points to cast Thunderwave
Fist Of Unbroken Air: R30' May spend 2+ Ki Points to inflict 3d10+ HP, push 20', and knock prone (DC 16 Strength half HP only)
Flames Of The Phoenix: May spend 4 Ki Points to cast Fireball
Gong Of The Summit: May spend 3 Ki Points to cast Shatter
Mist Stance: May spend 4 Ki Points to cast self Gaseous Form
Ride The Wind: May spend 4 Ki Points to cast self Fly
River Of Hungry Flame: May spend 5 Ki Points to cast Wall Of Fire
Rush Of The Gale Spirits: May spend 2 Ki Points to cast Gust Of Wind
Shadow Arts: Knows Minor Illusion cantrip and may spend 2 Ki Points to cast Darkness, Darkvision, Pass Without Trace, or Silence
Shadow Step: May use a bonus action to teleport 60' between dim or dark areas and gain Adv on first melee attack
Shape The Flowing River: R120' May spend 1 Ki Point to freeze, thaw, and shape 30' cu water
Sweeping Cinder Strike: May spend 2 Ki Points to cast Burning Hands
Tranquility: May gain Sanctuary effects between long rests (DC 16 Wisdom neg)
Water Whip: R30' May spend 2+ Ki Points to inflict 3d10+ HP bludgeoning and pull 25' or knock prone (DC 16 Strength half HP only)
Wave Of Rolling Earth: May spend 6 Ki Points to cast Wall Of Stone
